long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Christmas Tree on Chrome Make Christmas Great Again with a Decorated Tree by the Fireplace Cozy Snowy Nights

Minimalist Design: Clean, user-friendly interface for easy navigation.
Clock and Date: Stay updated with an intuitive time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Reach your favorite websites quickly.
Search Bar: Enjoy seamless browsing with the integrated search tool.
More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with additional features.
